Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Actuator rod end play exceeding tolerance. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 17/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
